text.en: Embodiment of the compassion and activity of all Victorious Ones,
text.en-trans: gyalwa kün gyi tukjé trinlé nam

text.en: To you I pray: in this life, the next and the intermediate state,
text.en-trans: solwa deb so di chi bardo kün

text.en: May you protect us from the hosts of fears and sufferings!
text.en-trans: jik dang dukngal tsok lé kyab tu sol
